Source Ultimate Combat pg. 164

Statistics

Cost 50 gp Weight 30 lbs

Category Ammunition; Proficiency Siege Engine

Description

This siege engine firearm ammunition can be loaded in a cannon or a fiend's mouth cannon. It is especially good at tearing through sails and dirigibles (see @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.sjmHLtUHjp10PRNg]{6.2.2. Full Vehicle Rules} and @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.RQx3RwhdQds2znsh]{6.2.2.09. Propulsion Devies}), dealing double its normal damage to those forms of propulsion.

When fired at a creature, on a hit, the creature must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude saving throw or be knocked prone.
